credit_line: Williams College Museum of Art, Prendergast Archive and Study Center, Gift of Mrs. Charles Prendergast
title: Art in Egypt
inscriptions: Inscriptions by Maurice Prendergast on inside front cover and inside back cover. Assorted pencil marks: pp. 59, 72, between 88-89, 107, 111, 274. Pencil sketches: bet. 88-89, 151, 153, 287. Brushstrokes: between 184-185.
